original: Loberg, Lars Gustaf, disponent, Göteborg, f. 21/4/86 i Gbg av apot. Gustaf L. o. Göthilda Wallberg. G. 1. 16 m. Sanna Book, d. 22; 2. 23 m. Margaretha Engström. Barn: Gösta f. 20, civ:ing., Sanna 22, pol. stud., Barbro 25, ing., Lars-Erik 30, stud. — Stud:-ex. 04, res:off:ex. 07, lantmät:ex. 12. Verkst. dir. i A-B Apot. Fören. Vat-tenfabr. i Gbg sed. 37. Led. av styr. f. De Fören. Kolsyrefabr. A-B o. Sv:es vattenfabr. riksförb.
translated: Loberg, Lars Gustaf, manager, Gothenburg, b. 21/4/86 in Gbg to pharmacist Gustaf L. and Göthilda Wallberg. Married 1. 16 m. to Sanna Book, d. 22; 2. 23 m. to Margaretha Engström. Children: Gösta b. 20, civil engineer, Sanna b. 22, political science student, Barbro b. 25, engineer, Lars-Erik b. 30, student. Received bachelor's degree in 1904, reserve officer examination in 1907, and land surveying examination in 1912. Executive director at A-B Apot. Fören. Vattenfabr. in Gbg since 1937. Board member of De Fören. Kolsyrefabr. A-B and Sv:es vattenfabr. riksförb.
